settings.title: How are your products shipped?
settings.text_1:
Products are shipped directly from the manufacturers to you, ensuring that all packing and transporting specifications are taken care of.

We use specialized shipping partners to ensure that large, heavy and/or delicate items get to you in pristine conditions.
settings.text_2: You can purchase directly from our store using any major credit or debit card. If you have any issues, please don't hesitate to get in touch with our support team at support@elitehomemethod.com
settings.question_3: How long until I get my order?
settings.text_3:
Most orders will be delivered to your door sometime between 3 and 10 business days.

However these times may vary depending on manufacturers and your location.

Our support team will be able to assist any questions that you have, simply write us at support@elitehomemethod.com
settings.text_4:
Of course! All our products are brand new, delivered from our manufacturers straight to you.

All our products include full manufacturer warranty, as well as our own satisfaction guarantee.

If you have any questions or issues, please contact us at support@elitehomemethod.com

settings.title: FAQ
settings.dbtfy_faq_banner_subtitle: Our customer service will be happy to help you.
